name: twOrbit
description:
A tiny pico-8 game for #tweettweetjam 6, in less than 560 characters of source code (including poking bytes to memory for sound effects).

  • Use the arrow keys ⬅️/➡️ to move your ship
  • ❎ (X on most keyboards) to fire
  • Clear all enemies ★ on a level to advance
  • There are 9 levels

I have ~14 characters left, so I may try to add a few more visuals at some point.

(ToDo: add source code link, and optionally a commented/expanded version of the source code if that's interesting to anyone else working on pico-8 tweetcarts)
